content: carrot crochet pattern the author-designer dorogina elena thank you for buying my crochet pattern i wish you happy crocheting this crochet pattern is my own author s work and it is intended only for your personal use please do not distribute and copy it attention this crochet pattern does not contain crocheting lessons please point the author of the pattern @dorogina_toys while publishing the photos of the toys crocheted with the help of this pattern note yarn consumption size and appearance of the toy depend on crochet density and how you hold the yarn the presented toy is crocheted with v and x look single_crochet over the hook v and under the hook x first you grab yarn over the hook and for making the second stitch grab it under the hook the finished toy when using the specified materials is 13-14 cm/ 5 1-5 5 inches make sure you crochet tight enough otherwise the stuffing will show through the holes crochet the toy in continuous spirals without a turning chain abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet increase increase crochet two stitches in one stitch decrease decrease crochet two stitches together for the front loops necessary materials yarn art jeans 55% cotton/45% acrylic 50 gr/160m - yarn art jeans № 35 yellow - yarn art jeans № 85 dark terracotta - yarn art jeans № 66 vinous - yarn art jeans № 69 green - hook № 2 0 - scissors - white thread - filler carrot 1 round 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 round 4 increase 12 3-5 round 8 single_crochet 3 row 6 round 1 single_crochet increase *4 12 7-10 round 12 single_crochet 4 row 11 round 2 single_crochet increase *4 16 12-15 round 16 single_crochet 4 row 16 round 3 single_crochet increase *4 20 17-20 round 20 single_crochet 4 row 21 round 4 single_crochet increase *4 24 22-25 round 24 single_crochet 4 row 26 round 5 single_crochet increase *4 28 27-31 round 28 single_crochet 5 row 32 round 6 single_crochet increase *4 32 33-42 round 32 single_crochet 10 row 43 round 6 single_crochet decrease *4 28 44 round 5 single_crochet decrease *4 24 45 round 24 single_crochet 46 round 2 single_crochet decrease *6 18 47 round 1 single_crochet decrease *6 12 cut off the long end of the thread tighten the hole with a needle hide the end of the thread inside the product the carrot tops knit around the last row that was pulled together with a needle thread the hook for 1 single_crochet knit 18 chain in the second loop from the hook down the chain tie 17 single_crochet 18 single_crochet we knit in the same single_crochet where we started thus we knit 5-6 times in a circle skipping 1 single_crochet your carrots are ready
